verses.verse: And take <WH7126> thou <WH859> unto <WH413> thee <WH853> Aaron <WH175> thy brother, <WH251> and his sons <WH1121> with <WH854> him, from among <WH4480> <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> that he may minister unto me in the priest's office, <WH3547> even Aaron, <WH175> Nadab <WH5070> and Abihu, <WH30> Eleazar <WH499> and Ithamar, <WH385> Aaron's <WH175> sons. <WH1121>
And thou shalt make <WH6213> holy <WH6944> garments <WH899> for Aaron <WH175> thy brother <WH251> for glory <WH3519> and for beauty. <WH8597>

And thou <WH859> shalt speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> all <WH3605> that are wise <WH2450> hearted, <WH3820> whom <WH834> I have filled with <WH4390> the spirit <WH7307> of wisdom, <WH2451> that they may make <WH6213> <WH853> Aaron's <WH175> garments <WH899> to consecrate <WH6942> him, that he may minister unto me in the priest's office. <WH3547>

And these <WH428> are the garments <WH899> which <WH834> they shall make; <WH6213> a breastplate, <WH2833> and an ephod, <WH646> and a robe, <WH4598> and an embroidered <WH8665> coat, <WH3801> a miter, <WH4701> and a girdle: <WH73> and they shall make <WH6213> holy <WH6944> garments <WH899> for Aaron <WH175> thy brother, <WH251> and his sons, <WH1121> that he may minister unto me in the priest's office. <WH3547>
And they <WH1992> shall take <WH3947> <WH853> gold, <WH2091> and blue, <WH8504> and purple, <WH713> and scarlet, <WH8438> <WH8144> and fine linen. <WH8336>

And they shall make <WH6213> <WH853> the ephod <WH646> of gold, <WH2091> of blue, <WH8504> and of purple, <WH713> of scarlet, <WH8438> <WH8144> and fine twined linen, <WH8336> <WH7806> with cunning <WH2803> work. <WH4639>
It shall have <WH1961> the two <WH8147> shoulder pieces <WH3802> thereof joined <WH2266> at <WH413> the two <WH8147> edges <WH7098> thereof; and so it shall be joined together. <WH2266>

And the curious girdle <WH2805> of the ephod, <WH642> which <WH834> is upon <WH5921> it, shall be <WH1961> of <WH4480> the same, according to the work <WH4639> thereof; even of gold, <WH2091> of blue, <WH8504> and purple, <WH713> and scarlet, <WH8438> <WH8144> and fine twined linen. <WH8336> <WH7806>
And thou shalt take <WH3947> <WH853> two <WH8147> onyx <WH7718> stones, <WH68> and grave <WH6605> on <WH5921> them the names <WH8034> of the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478>

Six <WH8337> of their names <WH4480> <WH8034> on <WH5921> one <WH259> stone, <WH68> and the other six <WH8337> names <WH8034> of the rest <WH3498> on <WH5921> the other <WH8145> stone, <WH68> according to their birth. <WH8435>

With the work <WH4639> of an engraver <WH2796> in stone, <WH68> like the engravings <WH6603> of a signet, <WH2368> shalt thou engrave <WH6605> <WH853> the two <WH8147> stones <WH68> with <WH5921> the names <WH8034> of the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> thou shalt make <WH6213> them to be set <WH4142> in ouches <WH4865> of gold. <WH2091>

And thou shalt put <WH7760> <WH853> the two <WH8147> stones <WH68> upon <WH5921> the shoulders <WH3802> of the ephod <WH646> for stones <WH68> of memorial <WH2146> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> and Aaron <WH175> shall bear <WH5375> <WH853> their names <WH8034> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> upon <WH5921> his two <WH8147> shoulders <WH3802> for a memorial. <WH2146>
And thou shalt make <WH6213> ouches <WH4865> of gold; <WH2091>

And two <WH8147> chains <WH8333> of pure <WH2889> gold <WH2091> at the ends; <WH4020> of wreathen <WH5688> work <WH4639> shalt thou make <WH6213> them, and fasten <WH5414> <WH853> the wreathen <WH5688> chains <WH8333> to <WH5921> the ouches. <WH4865>

And thou shalt make <WH6213> the breastplate <WH2833> of judgment <WH4941> with cunning <WH2803> work; <WH4639> after the work <WH4639> of the ephod <WH646> thou shalt make <WH6213> it; of gold, <WH2091> of blue, <WH8504> and of purple, <WH713> and of scarlet, <WH8438> <WH8144> and of fine twined linen, <WH8336> <WH7806> shalt thou make <WH6213> it.
Foursquare <WH7251> it shall be <WH1961> being doubled; <WH3717> a span <WH2239> shall be the length <WH753> thereof, and a span <WH2239> shall be the breadth <WH7341> thereof.

And thou shalt set <WH4390> in it settings <WH4396> of stones, <WH68> even four <WH702> rows <WH2905> of stones: <WH68> the first row <WH2905> shall be a sardius, <WH124> a topaz, <WH6357> and a carbuncle: <WH1304> this shall be the first <WH259> row. <WH2905>
And the second <WH8145> row <WH2905> shall be an emerald, <WH5306> a sapphire, <WH5601> and a diamond. <WH3095>
And the third <WH7992> row <WH2905> a ligure, <WH3958> an agate, <WH7618> and an amethyst. <WH306>
And the fourth <WH7243> row <WH2905> a beryl, <WH8658> and an onyx, <WH7718> and a jasper: <WH3471> they shall be <WH1961> set <WH7660> in gold <WH2091> in their enclosings. <WH4396>

And the stones <WH68> shall be <WH1961> with <WH5921> the names <WH8034> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> twelve, <WH8147> <WH6240> according to <WH5921> their names, <WH8034> like the engravings <WH6603> of a signet; <WH2368> every one <WH376> with <WH5921> his name <WH8034> shall they be <WH1961> according to the twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> tribes. <WH7626>
And thou shalt make <WH6213> upon <WH5921> the breastplate <WH2833> chains <WH8331> at the ends <WH1383> of wreathen <WH5688> work <WH4639> of pure <WH2889> gold. <WH2091>

And thou shalt make <WH6213> upon <WH5921> the breastplate <WH2833> two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> of gold, <WH2091> and shalt put <WH5414> <WH853> the two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> on <WH5921> the two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> of the breastplate. <WH2833>

And thou shalt put <WH5414> <WH853> the two <WH8147> wreathen <WH5688> chains of gold <WH2091> in <WH5921> the two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> which are on <WH413> the ends <WH7098> of the breastplate. <WH2833>

And the other two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> of the two <WH8147> wreathen <WH5688> chains thou shalt fasten <WH5414> in <WH5921> the two <WH8147> ouches, <WH4865> and put <WH5414> them on <WH5921> the shoulder pieces <WH3802> of the ephod <WH646> before <WH413> <WH4136> <WH6440> it.

And thou shalt make <WH6213> two <WH8147> rings <WH2885> of gold, <WH2091> and thou shalt put <WH7760> them upon <WH5921> the two <WH8147> ends <WH7098> of the breastplate <WH2833> in <WH5921> the border <WH8193> thereof, which <WH834> is in <WH413> the side <WH5676> of the ephod <WH646> inward. <WH1004>

And two <WH8147> other rings <WH2885> of gold <WH2091> thou shalt make, <WH6213> and shalt put <WH5414> them on <WH5921> the two <WH8147> sides <WH3802> of the ephod <WH646> underneath, <WH4480> <WH4295> toward <WH4480> <WH4136> the forepart <WH6440> thereof, over against <WH5980> the other coupling <WH4225> thereof, above <WH4480> <WH4605> the curious girdle <WH2805> of the ephod. <WH646>

And they shall bind <WH7405> <WH853> the breastplate <WH2833> by the rings <WH4480> <WH2885> thereof unto <WH413> the rings <WH2885> of the ephod <WH646> with a lace <WH6616> of blue, <WH8504> that it may be <WH1961> above <WH5921> the curious girdle <WH2805> of the ephod, <WH646> and that the breastplate <WH2833> be not <WH3808> loosed <WH2118> from <WH4480> <WH5921> the ephod. <WH646>

And Aaron <WH175> shall bear <WH5375> <WH853> the names <WH8034> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in the breastplate <WH2833> of judgment <WH4941> upon <WH5921> his heart, <WH3820> when he goeth in <WH935> unto <WH413> the holy <WH6944> place, for a memorial <WH2146> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> continually. <WH8548>

And thou shalt put <WH5414> in <WH413> the breastplate <WH2833> of judgment <WH4941> <WH853> the Urim <WH217> and the Thummim; <WH8550> and they shall be <WH1961> upon <WH5921> Aaron's <WH175> heart, <WH3820> when he goeth in <WH935> before <WH6440> the LORD: <WH3068> and Aaron <WH175> shall bear <WH5375> <WH853> the judgment <WH4941> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> upon <WH5921> his heart <WH3820> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> continually. <WH8548>
And thou shalt make <WH6213> <WH853> the robe <WH4598> of the ephod <WH646> all <WH3632> of blue. <WH8504>

And there shall be <WH1961> a hole <WH6310> in the top <WH7218> of it, in the midst <WH8432> thereof: it shall have <WH1961> a binding <WH8193> of woven <WH707> work <WH4639> round about <WH5439> the hole <WH6310> of it, as it were the hole <WH6310> of a habergeon, <WH8473> that it be <WH1961> not <WH3808> rent. <WH7167>

And beneath upon <WH5921> the hem <WH7757> of it thou shalt make <WH6213> pomegranates <WH7416> of blue, <WH8504> and of purple, <WH713> and of scarlet, <WH8438> <WH8144> round about <WH5439> <WH5921> the hem <WH7757> thereof; and bells <WH6472> of gold <WH2091> between <WH8432> them round about: <WH5439>
A golden <WH2091> bell <WH6472> and a pomegranate, <WH7416> a golden <WH2091> bell <WH6472> and a pomegranate, <WH7416> upon <WH5921> the hem <WH7757> of the robe <WH4598> round about. <WH5439>

And it shall be <WH1961> upon <WH5921> Aaron <WH175> to minister: <WH8334> and his sound <WH6963> shall be heard <WH8085> when he goeth in <WH935> unto <WH413> the holy <WH6944> place before <WH6440> the LORD, <WH3068> and when he cometh out, <WH3318> that he die <WH4191> not. <WH3808>

And thou shalt make <WH6213> a plate <WH6731> of pure <WH2889> gold, <WH2091> and grave <WH6605> upon <WH5921> it, like the engravings <WH6603> of a signet, <WH2368> HOLINESS <WH6944> TO THE LORD. <WH3068>

And thou shalt put <WH7760> it on <WH5921> a blue <WH8504> lace, <WH6616> that it may be <WH1961> upon <WH5921> the miter; <WH4701> upon <WH413> the forefront <WH4136> <WH6440> of the miter <WH4701> it shall be. <WH1961>

And it shall be <WH1961> upon <WH5921> Aaron's <WH175> forehead, <WH4696> that Aaron <WH175> may bear <WH5375> <WH853> the iniquity <WH5771> of the holy things, <WH6944> which <WH834> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall hallow <WH6942> in all <WH3605> their holy <WH6944> gifts; <WH4979> and it shall be <WH1961> always <WH8548> upon <WH5921> his forehead, <WH4696> that they may be accepted <WH7522> before <WH6440> the LORD. <WH3068>

And thou shalt embroider <WH7660> the coat <WH3801> of fine linen, <WH8336> and thou shalt make <WH6213> the miter <WH4701> of fine linen, <WH8336> and thou shalt make <WH6213> the girdle <WH73> of needlework. <WH4639> <WH7551>

And for Aaron's <WH175> sons <WH1121> thou shalt make <WH6213> coats, <WH3801> and thou shalt make <WH6213> for them girdles, <WH73> and bonnets <WH4021> shalt thou make <WH6213> for them, for glory <WH3519> and for beauty. <WH8597>

And thou shalt put them upon <WH3847> <WH853> <WH853> Aaron <WH175> thy brother, <WH251> and his sons <WH1121> with <WH854> him; and shalt anoint <WH4886> them, and consecrate <WH4390> <WH853> <WH3027> them, and sanctify <WH6942> them, that they may minister unto me in the priest's office. <WH3547>

And thou shalt make <WH6213> them linen <WH906> breeches <WH4370> to cover <WH3680> their nakedness; <WH1320> <WH6172> from the loins <WH4480> <WH4975> even unto <WH5704> the thighs <WH3409> they shall reach: <WH1961>

And they shall be <WH1961> upon <WH5921> Aaron, <WH175> and upon <WH5921> his sons, <WH1121> when they come in <WH935> unto <WH413> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> or <WH176> when they come near <WH5066> unto <WH413> the altar <WH4196> to minister <WH8334> in the holy <WH6944> place; that they bear <WH5375> not <WH3808> iniquity, <WH5771> and die: <WH4191> it shall be a statute <WH2708> forever <WH5769> unto him and his seed <WH2233> after <WH310> him.
